new_wallet.title: Welcome to your Florin wallet
new_wallet.information:
This wallet is only stored on your device.
Never give anyone else access to your wallet.
Keep the backup phrase you see at installation in a safe place.
Lose phrase or someone else with access to the phrase = lose Florin.

loader.synchronizing: Your wallet is now synchronizing with the Florin network. This may take some time to complete.

setup.choose_password: Choose a password of at least 6 characters
setup.choose_password_information: You will need your password to unlock your wallet. Make sure it is not easy to guess because anyone who knows your password can access your funds.
setup.create_new: I want to create a new wallet
setup.enter_existing_recovery_phrase: Enter your recovery phrase in the boxes below to restore your wallet.

invalid_recovery_phrase.title: Invalid recovery phrase
invalid_recovery_phrase.message: This combinatie is not a valid recovery phrase. Correct the error(s) and try again.

setup.recover_existing: I want to recover my wallet using my recovery phrase
setup.repeat_your_recovery_phrase: To make sure you have correctly written down your recovery phrase, enter your phrase in the boxes below.
setup.this_is_your_recovery_phrase: This is your recovery phrase. Keep your backup phrase in a safe place. Lose phrase or someone else with access to the phrase = lose Florin.

setup_mining.title: Setup mining
setup_mining.information: Before you can start mining Florin a mining account needs to be created. Enter your password to unlock your wallet and create a mining account.

receive_coins.information: After each transaction you will receive a new address, but the previous address will still work.

link_holding_account.title: Link Holding Account
link_holding_account.information: Linking a holding account with another wallet.
